articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Greetings to King of Swaziland
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Greetings to King of Swaziland
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Mswati III, king of Swaziland, on Monday on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim in his message expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily grow stronger in conformity with the common interests and desire of the people of the two countries, wishing Swaziland stability, development and prosperity.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Chinese Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with the delegation of Chinese cameramen led by Xin Qi, vice chairman of the Association for Promotion of Development of Chinese Culture and vice president of the China Association for International Friendly Contact, which paid a courtesy call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Organizations
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Association for Promotion of Development of Chinese Culture and the China Association for International Friendly Contact on the occasion of the 65th birth anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The gift was handed over to Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, on Thursday by Xin Qi, vice-chairman of the Association for Promotion of Development of Chinese Culture and vice-president of the China Association for International Friendly Contact on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Congratulations to Brazilian FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Brazilian FM
						
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun on Aug. 30 sent a congratulatory message to Luiz Alberto Figeiredo Machado upon his appointment as foreign minister of Brazil.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the future, too and wished him success in his new work.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket from Lao President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket from Lao President
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a floral basket from Choummaly Sayasone, president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic and general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 It was conveyed to an official concerned by Kiettisak Keobanhdith, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, on Thursday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Baskets from Foreign Figures and Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Baskets from Foreign Figures and Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets presented by the family of Zhang Weihua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, Jindallae Saphariny, president of the Jindallae Children's foundation, the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, the Association for Promotion of Friendship between Japan and North and South Korea, the Tokyo-Pyongyang Rainbow Bridge, Tukuji Yanagisawa, deputy chief director of the Japan-Korea Cultural Interchange Association, and Kazuaki Ashizawa, co-representative of the Tokyo Ward Assemblymen's Liaison Society for the Promotion of Japan-Korea Friendship, on Thursday on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the DPRK.

articles.title: Delegation of Youth League Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Youth League Leaves 
						
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League led by Vice-Chairman of its Central Committee Jong Yong Won left here Thursday to participate in the 3rd international preparatory meeting for the 18th World Festival of Youth and Students to be held in India.

articles.title: Staff Members of Missions of Int'l Organizations Pay Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Staff Members of Missions of Int'l Organizations Pay Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the missions of the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations, the World Health Organization and the World Food Program here laid floral baskets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Thursday on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the DPRK.
					 They placed floral baskets before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute in the humblest reverence to them who made immortal contributions to accomplishing the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Floral Baskets and Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Floral Baskets and Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un
						
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets and congratulatory letters from the diplomatic corps and the economic and commercial councilors corps here on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 They were handed over to Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun by Cambodian Ambassador to the DPRK Chhorn Hay, who is doyen of the diplomatic corps, and the Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan on behalf of the diplomatic corps, and to an official concerned by the councilor of the Russian embassy, on behalf of the economic and commercial councilors corps on Thursday.
					
					 On the same day, Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the ASEAN Committee. They were handed to an official concerned by Lao Ambassador to the DPRK Kiettisak Keobanhdith, who is chairman of the committee, and Ilham Tuah Bin Illias, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Malaysian embassy here.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Rim Min Sik, chairman of the Overseas Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), and his party visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill to pay tribute to them on Thursday.
					 They arrived here to participate in the celebrations of the 65th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK on the same day.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The congratulatory group of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) led by Kwon Sun Hui, advisor to its Central Standing Committee, came here today to participate in the celebrations of the 65th birth anniversary of the DPRK. The group visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill to pay tribute.
					 Members of the group laid bouquets before the statues and paid tribute in the humblest reverence for the peerlessly great men who made immortal contributions to strengthening and developing Chongryon.

articles.title: DPRK's Birth Anniversary Celebrated
articles.content:
DPRK's Birth Anniversary Celebrated
						
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Colorful events of people from all walks of life and youth and students took place on Thursday to celebrate the 65th birth anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The meeting of youth and students was held at the Central Youth Hall.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that the 65 year-long history covered by the DPRK is a proud road in which the country has emerged ever-victorious in the struggle to defend the country and achieve the prosperity of the country and brought about an epochal turn under the wise leadership of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 An art performance "Motherland, advance forward under the uplifted flame of creating the 'speed on Masik Pass'" was given by officials of the primary organizations and members of trade unions across the country at the Central Hall of Workers. 
					
					 A performance "Songun Korea, Do Prosper" was given by the members of art group of women's union at the plaza of the Arch of Triumph.
					
					 Members of women's union held a dancing party.
					
					 Agricultural workers held an oratorical meeting at the Central Youth Hall.
					
					 The performers highly praised the immortal feats the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by building a new country where people have become its master and turning the DPRK into the socialist power, dignified with independence, powerful thanks to Songun and prospering thanks to self-reliance.
					
					 A fine art exhibition of Pyongyang University of Fine Arts was opened with due ceremony at the Pyongyang Grand Theater.
					
					 Displayed in the venue of the exhibition are more than 370 art works produced by students of the university.

articles.title: New Stamps Mark 65th Birthday of DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Mark 65th Birthday of DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea recently issued new kinds of stamps (a sheetlet and an individual stamp) in celebration of the 65th DPRK birthday.
					 Seen in the upper part of the sheetlet are letters "Celebration of 65th DPRK anniversary" and "Juche 37 (1948)-Juche 102 (2013)".
					
					 The sheetlet features the smiling images of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, who founded a genuine people's state for the first time in the 5 000-year-long history of the Korean nation and turned the country into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in defence, against the background of the DPRK flag.
					
					 The individual stamp portrays the DPRK emblem.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Founder of DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Founder of DPRK 
						
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the 65th birthday of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, the Korean people are sorely missing President Kim Il Sung, who worked heart and soul to build a unified independent and sovereign state in Korea in face of the persistent separatist moves of outside forces. 
					 Building an independent and sovereign state in Korea, which was liberated from the Japanese colonial rule in August Juche 34 (1945), came across big hurdles from the outset, due to the obstructions of the United States that occupied the southern half of Korea.
					
					 In contrary to the Korean people's desire for independence, the U.S. forces began enforcing a rule of military administration in south Korea, forcibly dissolving the people's committees.
					
					 With a deep insight into the U.S. attempt to permanently occupy south Korea and dominate the whole of Korea, Kim Il Sung convened a conference for founding the Central Organizing Committee of the Communist Party of North Korea in October 1945, at which he set forth a line of founding a democratic people's republic representing the nation's complete independence and sovereignty.
					
					 In accordance with the line, he made big efforts to turn the northern half of Korea into a powerful base for realizing the nation's sovereignty.
					
					 On the first hand, he organized the Provisional People's Committee of North Korea in February 1946 and enforced a series of democratic reforms in reliance on it. 
					
					 In February 1947, he developed the Provisional People's Committee into the People's Committee of North Korea. 
					
					 Then he proposed convening the Joint Conference of Representatives of Political Parties and Social Organizations in North and South Korea, which would call for building a genuine unified democratic government by the Korean people themselves. 
					
					 Upset by it, the U.S. urged the south Korean puppets to carry on the "May 10 separate elections", leading to the birth of pro-American government in south Korea. 
					
					 Under such circumstances, Kim Il Sung began working for founding the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, a sole legitimate government for the Korean people.
					
					 He convened the Conference of Leaders of Political Parties and Social Organizations of North and South Korea on June 29, 1948 and the Fifth Session of the People's Assembly of North Korea on July 9, 1948. In the reports delivered at the conference and session, he advanced a line of setting up a legislature through the all-Korea general elections without delay to enact the constitution of the DPRK, in order to build an all-Korea government.
					
					 Thereupon, the general elections for founding the Supreme People's Assembly took place and the First Session of the SPA was held in Pyongyang in September 1948. 
					
					 In reflection of the unanimous desire of the entire Korean nation, the session elected Kim Il Sung prime minister of the DPRK Cabinet and head of the state, and he declared the birth of the DPRK as a unified independent and sovereign state for the Korean people.

articles.title: Sinphyong Kumgang Scenic Beauty Resort Completed
articles.content:
Sinphyong Kumgang Scenic Beauty Resort Built
						
 Sinphyong, September 5 (KCNA) -- The construction project of Sinphyong Kumgang Scenic Beauty Resort was newly built as a cultural recreation ground for the people with the approach of the 65th founding anniversary of the DPRK. 
					 The resort was the fruition of the devoted efforts made by Generalissimo Kim Jong Il to bring a happy life to the Korean people till the last moments of their life and the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Officials and builders in North Hwanghae Province scrupulously carried out the construction on the principle of protecting natural beauty of the resort from any damage and ensuring every convenience to visitors in sightseeing and rest from the very day of ground-breaking. 
					
					 They carried out the projects for digging thousands of cubic meters of earth for the dam foundation and hundreds of cubic meters of earth for the bridge foundation and completed the project of power station, bridge, etc. earlier than schedule.
					
					 There appeared in picturesque spots of the resort teashop, restaurant and other service facilities and observation decks of diverse styles and ponds. At the resting places visitors can enjoy different amusements including Korean chess and Yut-game.
					
					 Tens of kilometers of road for sightseeing was built and fountains, parking lots, etc. also appeared to please visitors.

articles.title: Many Cultural Recreation Grounds Built or Remodeled
articles.content:
Many Cultural Recreation Grounds Built or Remodeled 
						
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Many parks and pleasure grounds in scenic spots of the country were built or remodeled in recent years.
					 Leader Kim Jong Il went round the Kaeson Youth Park remodeled as required by the new century in April of Juche 99 (2010). During the visit he stressed the need to spruce up parks and pleasure grounds to provide better conditions for people's cultural recreation. 
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un clearly indicated the way of building a highly civilized socialist country. He has worked heart and soul to provide the Korean people with the best conditions for cultural and emotional life. 
					
					 True to his noble intention service personnel and people built cultural recreation grounds in different parts of the country. 
					
					 Parks and pleasure grounds in Pyongyang were newly built or remodeled. 
					
					 The Rungna People's Pleasure Park was successfully built on the picturesque bank of the Taedong River.
					
					 The Pyongyang Folklore Park made its appearance in the area of Mt. Taesong and Mangyongdae Amusement Park and Taesongsan Pleasure Park were splendidly remodeled. 
					
					 There appeared in more than 10 districts of Pyongyang over 80 parks having sports and amusement and public service facilities.
					
					 Scenic spots, pleasure grounds and parks in different parts of the country turned into cultural recreation grounds for people. 
					
					 Haeju Folk Park was newly built in South Hwanghae Province. 
					
					 Haean Pleasure Ground sprang up in a picturesque place of Wonsan, Kangwon Province, and the Pleasure Ground of Youth Park in a scenic spot of Kanggye, Jagang Province. Amusement facilities were built in Hamhung Youth Park in South Hamgyong Province. 
					
					 Similar parks and pleasure grounds were successfully remodeled in Phyongsong City of South Phyongan Province, Sariwon City of North Hwanghae Province, Hyesan City of Ryanggang Province, Tanchon of South Hamgyong Province, Unryul County of South Hwanghae Province and other cities and counties. 
					
					 Sinphyong Kumgang Scenic Beauty Resort in North Hwanghae Province was completed and scenic spots in Mt. Kuwol and Mt. Chilbo and Ryongmun Great Cavern were refurnished with better service facilities. 
					
					 Wading pools were built or remodeled in many cities and counties including Hamhung, Phyongsong and Kaesong cities and Ryongrim and Yonsan counties.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work 
						
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday dedicates an article to the fifth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Juche-Oriented Socialist State with Invincible Might". 
					 In the work Kim Jong Il proudly reviewed the glorious history of the DPRK which has covered the path of brilliant victory under the guidance of the party and the leader and clarified the exploits President Kim Il Sung performed in building a rich and powerful country and the invincible might of the DPRK and indicated overall tasks and ways to accomplish the Juche revolutionary cause under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Il glorified the President's Juche-oriented idea of nation-building and exploits generation after generation, the article says that thanks to his wise guidance the dignity and might of the DPRK have been put on the highest stage. 
					
					 The article goes on: Kim Jong Il exalted the dignity of the DPRK as an invincible socialist power. This immortal exploit finds its expression in that he successfully achieved the single-minded unity of the leader, party and masses, consolidated the socialist bulwark as firm as a rock by dint of Songun and fully embodied Juche character and national character in all aspects of nation-building and state activities. 
					
					 The Songun era led by Kim Jong Il saw the creation of a model in the revolutionary unity whereby the service personnel of the Korean People's Army, driving force of the Korean revolution, formed the relationship of comrades with the leader and the unity in thinking and work style was successfully achieved between the army and people. 
					
					 Under the Songun leadership of the party the People's Army has turned into the strong revolutionary Paektusan army and the national defense industry and the might of great army-people unity have grown stronger a thousand times. A new speed of grand advance for building an economic power and highly civilized socialist country has been created thanks to the vanguard role of the People's Army. This is the true picture of socialist Korea. 
					
					 The Korean revolution could win one victory after another along the orbit of Juche, the true nature of socialism was firmly preserved in all fabrics of social life and a new era of national prosperity opened on this land despite the unprecedented tests of history thanks to the experienced leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Probe into Truth behind Massacre of Koreans during Kanto Quake Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Probe into Truth behind Massacre of Koreans during Kanto Quake Demanded in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- 120 organizations of south Korea including the Federation of Homogeneous Nation Movement Organizations on Tuesday released a statement in demand of the Japanese government's apology, reparation and probe into truth behind the massacre of Koreans during Kato quake.
					 The statement said that they could not but be surprised by the fact that the brutal massacre of Koreans by the Japanese imperialists during the great Kanto quake is hardly mentioned in the modern history of Japan. 
					
					 It urged the Japanese government to properly reflect on the massacre of Koreans and probe truth behind it and reinstate those Koreans who were mercilessly killed.
					
					 It demanded Japan to give up national chauvinism, the root cause of crimes, and make an apology and reparation for the massacre.

articles.title: Actions Called for Those Responsible for Hypocritical Project of Four Large Rivers
articles.content:
Actions Called for Those Responsible for Hypocritical Project of Four Large Rivers
						
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The all-people measure committee for the improvement of the four large rivers and the committee for the investigation into the project for the four large rivers held a news conference in Seoul on Sept. 2, calling for actions against those who are responsible for destroying the ecological environment.
					 Referring to the fact that the project carried out by Lee Myung Bak turned out to be a charade, speakers at the meeting held that he should own legal, political and moral responsibility.
					
					 They warned that the second, third and fourth projects of the four big rivers will repeat themselves unless an end is put to the vicious cycle of such practices as not owning any accountability for destroying environment through misrule. 
					
					 They also called for punishing those forces who pressed ahead with  the project, which resulted in the waste of money collected from the people as taxes and ecological destruction, etc. and conducting a thorough-going investigation into the project.
					
					 Underscoring the need to conduct an all-people movement, they held that a group of people to indict those responsible for the project should be formed to make those concerned with the project own legal responsibility, probe the illegal spending of funds and institute a special law for the improvement of those damaged rivers.

articles.title: Ruling Forces' Moves to Conceal IS's Interference in Election Denounced
articles.content:
Ruling Forces' Moves to Conceal IS's Interference in Election Denounced 
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Elders of civic and social organizations of south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on Tuesday to denounce the ruling forces' moves to conceal the puppet Intelligence Service's interference in the election and conspiratorial plot. 
					 A press release was read out at the press conference. 
					
					 It accused the "government" and ruling party of trying to gloss over the IS case by describing it as an old issue irrelevant to them, far from probing truth behind the case as demanded by the people. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The chief executive repeatedly insisted that she got no help from the IS in the past election, but it is her top priority task as the person most responsible for the case to thoroughly probe the truth behind the case and own responsibility for the illegal act. 
					
					 The ruling forces are working hard to cover up IS's interference in politics, but they would be well advised to frankly admit all wrong doings, though belatedly.

articles.title: Chongryon Lecture in Tokyo Marks Birthday of DPRK
articles.content:
Chongryon Lecture in Tokyo Marks Birthday of DPRK 
 Tokyo, September 4 (KNS-KCNA) -- A lecture of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) took place at the Korean Hall on Wednesday to celebrate the 65th birthday of the DPRK.
					 Present there were officials of Chongryon.
					
					 Screened there was a Korean film documenting the leadership exploits of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is steadily adding shine to the history of victory of the Korean people.
					
					 The participants heard a recorded lecture titled "Our homeland ushering in the new heyday with high pride of being victor."

articles.title: Birthday of DPRK Celebrated in Various Countries
articles.content:
Birthday of DPRK Celebrated in Various Countries
						
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- A seminar was held in Mongolia, a celebration meeting in Kyrgyzstan and lectures in Tajikistan and Serbia on Aug. 27 and 29 to celebrate the 65th birthday of the DPRK.
					 N. Sarantuya, member of the Leadership Council of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, said that the history of 65 years covered by the DPRK is the glorious one in which it has steadily grown stronger, guided by the Juche idea.
					
					 A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity－《Kyrgyz El》Republican Political Party of Kyrgyzstan who is chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Kyrgyzstan, said:
					
					 The DPRK could win in the Korean War in the 1950s and demonstrate its independent dignity and usher in the heyday of its development despite the U.S. persistent moves to ignite a new war in the postwar period entirely thanks to the Songun leadership of President Kim Il Sung who steadily bolstered up its defence capability.
					
					 The might of the DPRK was further augmented by the Songun politics of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean people are now dynamically struggling to build an economic power and achieve the national reunification.
					
					 The DPRK will certainly achieve a final victory thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un and all the service personnel and people united close around him.
					
					 Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, and Batric Mijovic, general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia, praised the great Generalissimos for performing immortal exploits by exploring the way of building an unique socialist state centered on the popular masses and setting  a brilliant example.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Talk Posted on Peruvian Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Talk Posted on Peruvian Website 
						
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on Aug. 29 posted on its website supreme leader Kim Jong Un's talk "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution".  The talk was carried in Rodong Sinmun, organ of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Joson Inmingun, organ of the Korean People's Army, on August 25, Juche 102 (2013), the 53rd Day of Songun.
					 The homepage said in its preface:
					
					 The Songun history of Korea started when Generalissimo Kim Il Sung embarked on the road of revolution in his early years and launched the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle to defeat the brigandish Japanese imperialists. 
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Jong Il regarded the Songun idea, Songun politics as the only guiding idea and political mode for defending socialism and independence against imperialism and led the Korean revolution and the world revolution to victory with his Songun leadership.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un published the above-said historic talk on the occasion of the Day of Songun this year, reiterating his unshakable will to carry forward the Songun cause.
					
					 The Songun revolutionary idea and feats of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu will shine forever.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Posted on Website of British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Posted on Website of British Organization
						
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The full texts of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's works "Only Victory and Glory Are in Store for Us Who Are Advancing under the Unfurled Flag Bearing the Immortal Beaming Images of the Great Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il" and "Congratulatory Message to the Participants of Celebrations of Youth Day and Young People Across the Country" were posted on the website of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on August 25.
					 The first work, published on August 25, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the Songun revolutionary leadership feats of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It calls for waging a dynamic struggle for the final victory of the cause of Juche revolution, Songun revolution started and led to victory by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The second work, published on August 27, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the fact that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il pursued the original policy of attaching importance to the young people and the policy of loving them in the whole period of their revolutionary leadership, performing such undying exploits as perfectly solving the issue of young people for the first time in history.
					
					 It indicates the task to be fulfilled by the young people of the DPRK to more fully display their bravery, unity and combat capability in defending the country and building a thriving nation.

articles.title: DPRK Will Always Emerge Victorious: South African Organization
articles.content:
DPRK Will Always Emerge Victorious: South African Organization
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The South African Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website an article titled "DPRK, symbol of sovereignty and dignity" and other articles on August 27 on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of Day of Songun and the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The website in its article titled "DPRK demonstrating its dignity with Songun" said:
					
					 The course covered by the DPRK while overcoming all storms and stress of history for 65 years since 1948 is a history in which it has advanced and won victories by dint of Songun.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, put forward the Songun idea and founded the army guided by it in the early period of his revolutionary activities.
					
					 The DPRK is fully demonstrating the might of Songun.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un has solved all issues arising in the revolution and construction, carrying forward and developing in depth the Songun idea and line of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Thanks to his Songun leadership the DPRK has made world-startling achievements and miracles.
					
					 The DPRK is countering the U.S. hostile policy and nuclear threat with its toughest stand.
					
					 The international community is admiring at the resolution of the DPRK to firmly foil the highhanded and arbitrary practices of "the only superpower in the world" by dint of Songun.
					
					 The DPRK will always emerge victorious with Songun.

articles.title: Birthday of DPRK Observed by Indonesian Papers
articles.content:
Birthday of DPRK Observed by Indonesian Papers
						
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Indonesian papers carried special write-ups to mark the 65th birthday of the DPRK on August 29 and 30.
					 The International Media carried articles including "Today's Democratic People's Republic of Korea" illustrated with a photo of supreme leader Kim Jong Un and a photo of the statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					
					 The paper noted in an article titled "Invincible power" that the founding of the DPRK was a historic event which brought about a radical turn in carving out the destiny of the Korean people.
					
					 The founding of the DPRK made it possible for the country, once eclipsed in the world map, to demonstrate its dignity and might as an invincible power that no one dares provoke, it said, adding:
					
					 The DPRK is a politico-ideological power which has fully exercised its sovereignty on the basis of its solid socio-political foundation, guided by its transparent ideology.
					
					 Its single-minded unity based on the monolithic idea has become a fundamental cornerstone of its state political system and a source of all its victories.
					
					 It is an invincible military power that no one dares provoke.
					
					 The Suara Karya in an article titled "The 65 years of victory and glory" introduced the proud history of the DPRK in which it has worked epoch-making miracles, demonstrating invincibility in the struggle against imperialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Supported by Political Party of Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Supported by Political Party of Kyrgyzstan
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity - "Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party, issued a statement on Aug. 30 in support of the talk "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" given by supreme leader Kim Jong Un to Rodong Sinmun, organ of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Joson Inmingun, organ of the Korean People's Army, on the occasion of the Day of Songun.
					 The statement stressed that the work is a historic declaration that the DPRK will dynamically advance forever along the road of independence, guided by the Juche idea, Songun idea.
					
					 It affirmed that the service personnel and people of the DPRK led by Kim Jong Un will win victory by holding aloft  the great banner of Songun in the future, too.

articles.title: Foreign Papers Observe Birthday of DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Papers Observe Birthday of DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of Nepal and Bulgaria dedicated special write-ups to the 65th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 The Aug. 31 issue of the Nepali newspaper Jana Sata edited an article titled "Invincible Power" illustrated with a photo of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The paper said that the founding of the DPRK was a historic event which brought about a decisive turn in carving out the destiny of the Korean people. It went on:
					
					 The founding of the DPRK made it possible for the country, once eclipsed in the world map, to demonstrate its might as an invincible power which no country dares to provoke.
					
					 The DPRK is a military power with tremendous military muscle which no force can match.
					
					 It is pushing forward the building of an economic and sports power while exalting its dignity as a political and ideological and military power.
					
					 On the same day the Nepalese newspaper Janmabhumi carried an article titled "Icons of the DPRK" illustrated with a photo of Kim Il Sung introducing the national flag and emblem of the DPRK.
					
					 The Aug. 1-15 issue of the Bulgarian newspaper Novo Rabotnichesko Delo carried an article titled "Struggle for Peace and Prosperity".
					
					 The paper said that the DPRK has made a great contribution to the world peace, recalling that it has pursued a consistent policy of loving peace from the first day of its birth.
					
					 The paper lashed at the U.S. for having ceaselessly worked hard to stifle the DPRK in order to realize its old ambition to dominate the world, escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al rey de Suazilandia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al rey de Suazilandia 
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 2 un mensaje de felicitacion al rey de Suazilandia, Mswati III, con motivo del 45o aniversario de la independencia de este pais.
					El remitente hace votos por la estabilidad, el desarrollo y la prosperidad de Suazilandia y expresa la conviccion de que continuaran fortaleciendose y desarrollandose las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la RPDC y Suazilandia conforme a los intereses comunes y deseos de los dos pueblos.

articles.title: Tienen lugar actos por el 65o aniversario de fundacion de la RPDC
articles.content:
Tienen lugar actos por el 65o aniversario de fundacion de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, tuvieron lugar hoy variadas actividades de los jovenes, estudiantes y trabajadores de diversos estratos.
					Se efectuo el acto de festejo de jovenes y estudiantes en la Casa Central de la Juventud.
					
					En la ocasion, los oradores senalaron que la historia de 65 anos de la RPDC deviene la trayectoria enorgullecedora de cambios seculares en que se lograron victorias en la lucha por defender la patria y traer la prosperidad del pais superando las severas dificultades de la revolucion bajo la sabia orientacion de los grandes hombres sin iguales.
					
					Se realizaron por separado en la Casa Central de Obreros y la explanada frente al Arco de Triunfo la funcion de los funcionarios de las organizaciones de base y los miembros de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea de todo el pais "!Adelante la patria creando la 'velocidad Masikryong'!" y la otra de las miembros de los grupos artisticos de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea "!Que prospere, la patria de Songun!"
					
					Las gremiales de la UMDC organizaron seguidamente el baile.
					
					Los trabajadores agricolas sostuvieron el encuentro de oratoria en la Casa Central de la Juventud.
					
					Los participantes encomiaron las imperecederas hazanas de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il quienes edificaron nuevo pais donde el pueblo es dueno de la tierra y del pais y convirtieron la RPDC en la digna potencia socialista basada en el poderio del Songun.
					
					De otro lado, quedo inaugurada en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang la galeria del Instituto Superior de Bellas Artes de Pyongyang.
					
					Se exhibieron en la ocasion mas de 370 pinturas de diversos generos hechas por los estudiantes del citado plantel docente.

articles.title: Iniciada exposicion fotografica nacional
articles.content:
Iniciada exposicion fotografica nacional
						
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, quedo iniciada la exposicion fotografica nacional "65 anos de victorias y glorias".
					Alli se veian las fotos alusivas a la trayectoria de 65 anos de la RPDC socialista que ha venido registrando auges de prosperidad abriendo nueva historia de cambio bajo la guia de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					Se distinguian las fotografias intituladas "El gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung se elige como Primer Ministro del Consejo de Ministros en el primer periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea", "El Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il visitando un puesto militar en el frente avanzado", "La Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk votando en el terreno" y "El Mariscal Kim Jong Un encontrandose en la tribuna de la ceremonia de inauguracion del Palacio del Sol Kumsusan, supremo lugar del Juche".
					
					La ceremonia inaugural tuvo lugar el dia 4 en el Palacio de Estudio del Pueblo con la participacion del secretario del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, el vicepresidente del Presidium de la APS, Yang Hyong Sop, y otros funcionarios junto con los trabajadores capitalinos.

articles.title: Emitidos sellos en homenaje a 65o aniversario de fundacion de RPDC
articles.content:
Emitidos sellos en homenaje a 65o aniversario de fundacion de RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- La Direccion Estatal de Sellos de Corea emitio un sello enterizo y el otro individual en celebracion del 65o aniversario de la fundacion (9 de septiembre) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En la parte superior del papel enterizo, esta inscrito la letra "En celebracion del 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea" y "37 (1948) de la Era Juche-102 (2013) de la Era Juche".
					
					Tambien se ven, con la bandera nacional de la Republica en el trasfondo, las imagenes sonrientes del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il quienes edificaron un verdadero Estado del pueblo por primera vez en la historia nacional de cinco milenios y lo glorificaron como potencia socialista de caracter independiente, autosostenido y autodefensivo.
					
					En el papel individual esta dibujado el escudo de la RPDC.
